roleset.name: direct
roleset.note: CHANNEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'channel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry at the moment. (from channel.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually just with destination
example.text: Second, they channel monthly mortgage payments into semiannual payments, reducing the administrative burden on investors.
example.arg: reducing the administrative burden on investors

example.name: occasionally with source also
example.text: The bank also says it'll use its international network *trace* to channel investment from London, Frankfurt, Zurich and Paris into the Spanish stock exchanges.
example.arg: from London, Frankfurt, Zurich and Paris
